SEARCH
Package basepack

Class Room

java.lang.Object
basepack.Room
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Deluxe, Executive, Standard
public abstract class Room extends Object implements Serializable
The Room class represents a room in a hotel with a name, base price, and a list of reservations.
See Also:

      public Room(String roomName)
      Constructs a Room instance with the specified room name. Initializes the base price to 1299 and sets up an empty list of reservations.
      Parameters:
      roomName - The name of the room.

    • addReservation

      public void addReservation(String name, int checkIn, int checkOut, String[] breakdown)
      The addReservation() method creates a new Reservation object with the given name, check-in date, check-out date, and adds it to the reservation list.
      Parameters:
      name - The name parameter represents the name of the person making the reservation.
      checkIn - The check-in date for the reservation.
      checkOut - The check-out represents the date when the reservation ends.
      breakdown - The breakdown of the reservation.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      String message if successful or not.

    • isAvailable

      public boolean isAvailable(int checkIn, int checkOut)
      The method isAvailable() checks if a given time range is available for reservation based on existing reservations.
      Parameters:
      checkIn - The check-in date of a new reservation that needs to be checked for availability.
      checkOut - The check-out date of a reservation.
      Returns:
      true if the property is available for the given check-in and check-out dates, and false otherwise.

    • priceBreakdown

      public String[] priceBreakdown(int promoValidity, int checkIn, int checkOut)
      the priceBreakdown() method constructs the String[] that will be printed, corresponding to the price breakdown of the entire stay, including the total price.
      Parameters:
      promoValidity - The promo validity.
      checkIn - The check-in date.
      checkOut - The check-out date.
      Returns:
